body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. The user casts Sparkmage Apprentice, to which the AI responds with Withstand (prevent the next 3 damage).
2. Sparkmage is put onto the battlefield, and deals 1 damage to the AI, which is prevented thanks to Withstand.
3. The user attacks with Earth Elemental and Mudbrawler Raiders; the computer blocks Earth Elemental with Valiant Guard+Spirit Mantle.

So, Mudbrawler Raiders (3/3) is not blocked; its first 2 damage should be prevented thanks to Withstand, but not the 3rd damage.  Instead, Mudbrawler deals no damage at all to the AI (instead of 1 damage).

(Magarena 1.19 on Mac OS X, default AI.)
author: [eolebi...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/111792144621865451883/)
title: Damage not fully assigned

comments.body: This problem might actually be the same as the one described in Issue 95 : in step 2 above, Sparkmage probably does not deal 1 damage (even though it should).  This would explain that Mudbrawler Raiders has its 3 damages prevented.
